name: Elridge Gammad
text: No its what we call avoiding the issue, dilatory tactics and not practicing what you preach. If you are running on a platform of transparency you should be transparent yourself specially facing an allegation of this magnitude unless you are hiding something. Its not a good example to Filipinos and obviously to the other politicians. Other lawyers have weighed in and they said it wasn't enough. This issue is a non-issue if he showed the transaction history   Sounds simple to me.
